p: The polyphenolic compounds of the methanol extract from A. zerumbet leaves were identified via HPLC-ESI-MS/MS. 37 compounds were characterized, which consist of flavonoids (aglycones and glycosides) and benzoic and cinnamic acid derivatives. Table 1 summarizes the list of the compounds. Figure 1 shows the corresponding HPLC-ESI-MS/MS profile.
